question: Which Indian Private bank has launched an API Banking Portal with the highest number of virtual Application programming interfaces (API)?
explanation:
Leading Private Sector Bank of India, ICICI Bank recently launched an API Banking portal with 250 virtual Application programming interfaces (API), which is the maximum APIs clubbed by any Indian bank.
Through this API Banking platform, the partner companies around the world can customise and co-create applications of their choice, test and generate code by a hassle-free mechanism and also in lesser time. APIs are set of instructions, which will enable the third-party applications to connect with the bankâ€™s technology applications and team up to create new customer solutions.
